doc:
William Katt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Katt 0 William Theodore Katt (born February 16, 1951) is an American film and television actor, voice artist and musician best known as the star of the television series The Greatest American Hero. He first became known for playing Tommy Ross, the ill-fated prom date of Carrie White in the film version of Carrie (1976) and subsequently starred in films such as First Love (1977), Big Wednesday (1978) and Butch and Sundance: The Early Days (1979). Between 1985 and 1988, he starred in nine Perry Mason television films alongside his mother Barbara Hale, who reprised her role as Della Street from the television series Perry Mason. William_Theodore_Katt ( born February_16_,_1951 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor , voice_artist_and_musician best_known as the_star of the_television_series The_Greatest_American_Hero . He first became known for playing Tommy_Ross , the_ill-fated_prom_date of Carrie_White in the_film_version of Carrie_(_1976_) and subsequently_starred in films such_as First_Love_(_1977_) , Big_Wednesday_(_1978_) and Butch_and_Sundance : The_Early_Days ( 1979_) . Between 1985_and_1988 , he starred in nine_Perry_Mason_television_films alongside his_mother_Barbara_Hale , who reprised her_role as Della_Street from the_television_series_Perry_Mason .
